meanings.definition: A large, thick cut of beef from the short loin, containing both a T-bone and a tenderloin.
meanings.sent1: The porterhouse on the plate was huge and juicy.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a porterhouse steak for dinner last night.
meanings.sent3: The porterhouse looked so big that it could feed a whole family!
meanings.sent4: The porterhouse was a meaty masterpiece on the grill.
meanings.sent5: The sizzling porterhouse made my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A type of steak cut from a porterhouse.

meanings.sent2: I prefer the porterhouse over other steak cuts.
meanings.sent3: The porterhouse was so good, it disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: The porterhouse was a savory delight on the plate.
